name: Forgotten Spell
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2018.

A side scrolling adventure game that offers puzzles that would be a breeze if magic had been left accessible. This game gives you a well established wizard who has been relieved of his ability to use magic at all. Join Anator on his quest to reveal the truth on why magic has left the world as he literally learns to use his body the good old fashioned way.
First game ever created by Shane Marnell (samdalz4000), Klay Miller (Mr.Whitedude), Brad Tillery (DragonGod1395), using Paper2D in Unreal Engine.
